item.description:
Spiritual Awakening and Divine Openings with Judy
Join us for an evening of radiant bliss with sacred ceremony, meaningful discussions about our awakenings process. Two or three Divine Openings or Divine Healings will be offered to each person..
This group meets monthly; normally the third Thursday of each month

This program is for anyone interested in accessing and sustaining higher consciousness. We will  lift our hearts and energy fields in meditation. You will receive two or three Divine Openings and/or Divine Healings, and learn about ways to open and sustain freedom through higher vibrations.
     Divine Openings is an enlightenment activation. No matter where you are on your path of awakening, you will love this sacred way of being in divine energy! The Divine Presence becomes apparent as divine love and joy.
    Judy will share light teachings based on her ongoing deep studies in the area of conscious awakening. At our meetings we can freely express and connect with like- hearted souls as we share in the powerful energy transmissions that provide expanded awareness.
   Judy was initiated by spiritual teacher Lola Jones to provide Divine Openings. Lola is the author of Everything is Going Great in My Absence, available through Judy.

Comments after other programs...
"I just want you to know I feel incredible! The energy is so powerful and the sense of expansion is remarkable! Thank you for introducing me to this!" -Sylvia"
"Thank you so much for offering these Divine Openings; working my way through the book alone was, well, lonely...so I am delighted to have a community of kindred spirits to share parts of the journey with."- Pat
"I stayed really happy and energized after the last group. I'm laughing a lot!"
"A lot of remarkable coincidences happened, and things I want are coming my way easily, no effort!"
"I saw so much bring light and felt so much love!"
"So much peace, it's amazing."
item.name: Spiritual Awakening and Divine Openings
